meta.title: Implement OAuth2 integration for Google and GitHub

task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 7 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Add OAuth2 authentication flows for Google and GitHub providers with callback handling and user account linking
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Add dependency: oauth2 = "4.4" 2. Create src/domain/oauth.rs with: - OAuth2 client configuration for Google and GitHub - GET /api/auth/oauth/:provider: redirect to provider authorization URL with state parameter - GET /api/auth/oauth/:provider/callback: handle callback * Exchange code for token * Fetch user info from provider API * Find or create user in database by email * Generate JWT tokens 3. Store OAuth state in Redis with 10min TTL for CSRF protection 4. Add oauth_provider, oauth_id columns to users table 5. Environment variables: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID, GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET, GITHUB_CLIENT_ID, GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-7): Implement OAuth2 integration for Google and GitHub

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Manual test: initiate OAuth flow, complete authorization, verify JWT returned. Unit test state validation. Test account linking when email exists. Mock provider APIs for integration tests
